auth

Interface Authenticatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Band, Event, Gig, Member, Person, Rehearsal

    public interface Authenticatable
    the interface which all objects which are protected by the Authenticator need to implement
    Author:
    OOP Gruppe 187

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Authenticatable.Permission
      enum which contains all the possible permission groups

    • Method Detail

      • allowedMethod

        boolean allowedMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method m,
                    Authenticatable.Permission p)
        Parameters:
        m - method which is being queries
        p - permission group which is checked
        Returns:
        true if the method can be invoked with the given permission group

      • getPermissions

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.reflect.Method,java.util.ArrayList<Authenticatable.Permission>> getPermissions()
        Returns:
        the permissions-hashmap

      • getRole

        Authenticatable.Permission getRole(Authenticatable auth)
        Parameters:
        auth - object of which we want the permissions
        Returns:
        returns the role of @auth in the context of the current object

      • getRoles

        java.util.HashMap<Authenticatable,Authenticatable.Permission> getRoles()
        Returns:
        the roles-hashmap

      • initPermissions

        void initPermissions()
        used to initialize the permissions for each method

      • setRole

        void setRole(Authenticatable auth,
           Authenticatable.Permission p)
        Parameters:
        auth - auth-object for which we set the permission group
        p - permission group that is being set
